data.value: .  A Dataset is returned containing only the variables for which all the filter tests pass. These tests are either
returns True. The callable will be passed a single value, either the value of the attribute
if the DataArray does not have an attribute with the name
New dataset with variables filtered by attribute.
with variables that match specific conditions.
Get variables matching a specific standard_name:

data.out:
<xarray.Dataset>
Dimensions:         (x: 2, y: 2, time: 3)
Coordinates:
    lon             (x, y) float64 -99.83 -99.32 -99.79 -99.23
    lat             (x, y) float64 42.25 42.21 42.63 42.59
  * time            (time) datetime64[ns] 2014-09-06 2014-09-07 2014-09-08
    reference_time  datetime64[ns] 2014-09-05
Dimensions without coordinates: x, y
Data variables:
    precipitation   (x, y, time) float64 5.68 9.256 0.7104 ... 7.992 4.615 7.805

<xarray.Dataset>
Dimensions:         (x: 2, y: 2, time: 3)
